All Classes and Interfaces

Classes
Class
Description
Alerts
A utility class for displaying various types of alert dialogs.
application
The main entry point for the application.
Appointment
Represents an appointment, extending the DataCache class.
AppointmentController
 
AppointmentDAO
A Data Access Object (DAO) class for managing Appointment data.
AppointmentReportController
Controller for the Appointment Report scene.
Contact
Represents a contact in the system, with an ID, name, and email address.
ContactDAO
A Data Access Object (DAO) class for managing Contact data.
CountReportController
Controller for the Schedule Report scene.
Customer
Represents a Customer, extending the DataCache class.
CustomerController
 
CustomerDAO
A Data Access Object (DAO) class for managing Customer data.
DAO<T extends DataCache>
An abstract Data Access Object (DAO) class for managing data in a database.
DashboardController
DashboardController is responsible for controlling the application's dashboard and managing appointments and customer data.
DataCache
Represents an abstract DataCache class that stores the data for appointments, customers, users, contacts, and locations.
DBConnection
This class provides methods to manage a database connection using JDBC.
Formatter
A utility class for handling date and time operations, such as conversions between different time zones and formatting.
Location
Represents a location, extending the DataCache class.
LocationDAO
A Data Access Object (DAO) class for managing Location data (Country and first level divisions).
LoginController
A controller class for handling user login and authentication.
ReportDAO
Data Access Object for generating various reports based on the data in the database.
SceneManager
A utility class responsible for creating and managing application scenes, including managing the controllers for each scene.
ScheduleReportController
Controller for the Contact Count Report scene.
TableFormatter
A utility class for constructing and formatting tables with specific columns and properties for appointment and customer data.
User
A class that represents a user and inherits from the DataCache class.
UserDAO
A Data Access Object (DAO) class for managing USer data .
